channel.title: My banned character, funny thing lol
channel.description:
ok, at 18.49 i got this message from jagex:
Hi Haiwan15, Just a quick note to say that we have now had a chance to look at the abuse report that you recently sent to us. You will be pleased to know that we have now taken action against the player you reported and we hope that they will not be causing any more trouble in the game. Thanks again for helping to make Runescape a better game for everyone. Sincerely, RuneScape Customer Support
i was just reporting people for fun while i was using an auto spammer that said following: fuck u all, fuck ya mamas. it wrote real fast. then i sweared a little more. i did that for two days. but the funny part is that 2 minutes after that message at 18.51 i got this:
Hi Haiwan15, You have been caught being verbally abusive to another player in the game. Please refer to article number 1 in the rules: Rule 1: You must not use any language which may be considered by others to be offensive, racist or obscene.This behaviour will NOT be tolerated in RuneScape. Our report abuse system means there is no chance of your getting away with breaking the rules anymore. Please make sure you have read the rules on conduct found in the RuneScape Manual at: http://www.runescape.com These rules are being strictly enforced and must not be broken. There are now TWO 'black-marks' against your account, and you have been banned from the game for 3 days. Any further incidents of you breaking the rules WILL result in further action being taken against you.
the funny shit is that when people said something back to me when i sweared i reported them. yea, im a fucking asshole.

item.title: My banned character, funny thing lol
item.dc:creator: @nejat nejat
item.description:
@nejat wrote:

dude i dont wanna start flame people. i have been banned from enough forums because of flaming, so lets just be friends

Read full topic

item.title: My banned character, funny thing lol
item.dc:creator: @BlackThursday BlackThursday
item.description:
@BlackThursday wrote:

[quote=“nejat, post:20, topic:2498”][quote author=hdkilla link=topic=2705.msg34045#msg34045 date=1148065788]

so what if he is the best scripter, its who we are in like real life that matters. i 158% sure that ill own him in real life. and thats not just talking.

Wow, pretty precise prediction, 158% sure that you will own him in real life, and how in the hell would you prove this?
[/quote]

i will prove this by kicking your ass first[/quote]

Big man talking over his internet connection…

Read full topic

item.source: My banned character, funny thing lol

item.title: My banned character, funny thing lol
item.dc:creator: @nejat nejat
item.description:
@nejat wrote:

haha okey guys read this: this is from 10 may 2006, now i cant report anyone for [size=10pt]60 DAYS[/size]

From: Jagex Subject: Re: Your RuneScape Account Date: 10 May 2006 18:24 Delete

Hi Haiwan15,

We have now had a chance to look at the abuse report that you recently sent to us.

Unfortunately the report does not appear to show any serious offense being committed.

Since we have contacted you previously about what we feel is an appropriate use of the ‘report abuse’ feature, we have decided to temporarily prevent this account from submitting any further abuse reports for 60 days.

Please only use the ‘report abuse’ button for serious chat/trade related offenses where there is clear evidence of an offence taking place.

Before sending in a verbal abuse report please try and think about whether you are genuinely offended by the other players remarks. If the chat filter has blocked out the profanity there is no need to send in a report. Please only do so if you are genuinely offended.

Sending in hoax reports slows us down with dealing with your other queries, and repeatedly doing so is likely to result in action being taken against your account.

If you would like more information on how best to use the in game report system then please see our Reporting Abuse Guide which is located in the Rules & Security section on our website. (www.runescape.com)

Sincerely,
RuneScape Customer Support

LLLLLLLLLLLLLLOOOOLLLLLLL

Read full topic
